name: Legendary Arcane 2
description:
Legendary Arcane 2 Universe is an adventure game with 32 Pieces of equipment, more than 20 spells., a levelling system, unlockable skills., over 40 secrets to discover and 8 unique bosses. There are four difficulty modes in the game. Even the easy mode can be challenging so the Insane mode is only for the most hardcore gamer.

Legendary Arcane Magical Arena is also included, a 4-player local platformer game. 8 unique mages, each with 6 widely different spells, learn and master those to fit your strategy and beat your couch opponents. Easy to play, steep mastering curve. Bump the head of others, run for power-ups, afflict enemies with status ailments, dash to dodge spells & reach further, haunt survivors relentlessly as a ghost. Over 60 arenas and mini-games, solo modes and original soundtrack. Designed for controller pad but keyboard friendly.
